_sText:
Inspired by John Cooney's "This is the only level"



There is only one level......

So this is my second bhop map, let me start by saying, you shouldn't take this too seriously.  

I created this with the intentions of just coming up with any random idea in my head or from friends for gameplay and creating it in hammer. Basically every level has the same layout, textures, etc, yet the gameplay itself is always different in some weird way. Yes I know the game this is based off of is very old,  but the idea to make this just popped into my head out of nowhere. 

I also somehow hit the entity limit from too many lights so I had to delete half of them.... hmmm 

Enjoy :)
